def_cn: 齐心协力；团结起来；通力合作
def_en: If people pull together, they help each other or work together in order to deal with a difficult situation.

def_cn: 保持镇定；克制自己；振作起来
def_en: If you are upset or depressed and someone tells you to pull yourself together, they are telling you to control your feelings and behave calmly again.

def_cn: 把…串到一起；把…连成一个整体
def_en: If you pull together different facts or ideas, you link them to form a single theory, argument, or story.
